name: cherry's dreams
description:
Explore the space and try to take snaps of the shot shown at the top right as fast as you can! Higher the difficulty, the more accurate you need to be.

Web Monetization Features

  • Difficulty selection
  • Area restriction (inside the house)
  • Leader Board

Controls

movement: [WASD]

look around: right-click + drag

snap: [space]

movement sensitivity: scroll wheel

toggle UI: [F]
